File Explorer.Name: Show file extensions
File Explorer.Description: Shows file extensions for known file types. Major security improvement.

File Explorer.Name: Show hidden files
File Explorer.Description: Shows hidden files and folders for troubleshooting and system access.

File Explorer.Name: Show system files
File Explorer.Description: Shows protected system files. Advanced users only.
File Explorer.Warning: CRITICAL: Showing system files exposes critical Windows files that can break your system if modified or deleted. Only enable if you are an advanced user who understands the risks.

File Explorer.Name: Disable quick access
File Explorer.Description: Disables recent files tracking in File Explorer for privacy.

Privacy & Telemetry.Name: Disable Cortana
Privacy & Telemetry.Description: Disables Cortana voice assistant and data collection.

Privacy & Telemetry.Name: Disable OneDrive auto-start
Privacy & Telemetry.Description: Prevents OneDrive from starting automatically at boot.
Privacy & Telemetry.Warning: WARNING: Disabling OneDrive auto-start may interrupt file synchronization and backup processes. Files may not sync automatically to the cloud.

Privacy & Telemetry.Name: Reduce telemetry
Privacy & Telemetry.Description: Sets telemetry to Security level (Enterprise) or Basic level (Home/Pro).
Privacy & Telemetry.Warning: Full disable only works on Enterprise/Education editions.

Privacy & Telemetry.Name: Disable activity history
Privacy & Telemetry.Description: Disables activity history tracking and timeline features.

Privacy & Telemetry.Name: Disable web search in Start Menu
Privacy & Telemetry.Description: Removes web search results from Start menu search.

Privacy & Telemetry.Name: Disable background apps
Privacy & Telemetry.Description: Prevents apps from running in background to save resources.
Privacy & Telemetry.Warning: WARNING: Disabling background apps will break notifications, live tiles, and automatic updates for Microsoft Store apps. Many modern applications depend on background execution.

Windows 11 Interface.Name: Taskbar left alignment
Windows 11 Interface.Description: Moves taskbar icons to left side like Windows 10.

Windows 11 Interface.Name: Classic right-click menu
Windows 11 Interface.Description: Restores full right-click context menu without 'Show more options'.

Windows 11 Interface.Name: Disable widgets
Windows 11 Interface.Description: Hides widgets button from taskbar and disables panel.

Windows 11 Interface.Name: Disable Chat icon on taskbar
Windows 11 Interface.Description: Removes Teams Chat icon from taskbar.

Windows 11 Interface.Name: Disable Snap layouts hover
Windows 11 Interface.Description: Disables snap layout suggestions when hovering over maximize button.

Windows 11 Interface.Name: Configure Start menu layout
Windows 11 Interface.Description: Shows more pinned items and fewer recommendations in Start menu.

Windows 11 Interface.Name: Disable search highlights
Windows 11 Interface.Description: Disables dynamic search suggestions and highlights in search box.

Windows 10 Interface.Name: Hide Task View button
Windows 10 Interface.Description: Hides Task View button from taskbar (use Win+Tab instead).

Windows 10 Interface.Name: Configure search box
Windows 10 Interface.Description: Shows search icon instead of full search box (0=hidden, 1=icon, 2=box).

Windows 10 Interface.Name: Disable News and Interests
Windows 10 Interface.Description: Disables weather and news feed on taskbar.

General Interface.Name: Dark theme
General Interface.Description: Enables dark mode for applications and system UI.

General Interface.Name: Disable tips and suggestions
General Interface.Description: Disables Windows tips, suggestions, and promotional content.

General Interface.Name: Disable startup sound
General Interface.Description: Disables Windows startup sound for faster and quieter boot.

General Interface.Name: Disable lock screen
General Interface.Description: Skips lock screen and goes directly to login screen.
General Interface.Warning: WARNING: Disabling the lock screen may violate corporate security policies and reduce system security in shared environments.

System Performance.Name: Enable developer mode
System Performance.Description: Enables sideloading of apps and developer features.
System Performance.Warning: CRITICAL: Developer mode reduces system security by allowing unsigned apps and sideloading. Only enable if you are actively developing applications.

System Performance.Name: Disable Teams auto-start
System Performance.Description: Prevents Microsoft Teams from starting automatically.

System Performance.Name: Disable Windows Update automatic restart
System Performance.Description: Prevents automatic restart for Windows Updates when users are logged in.

System Performance.Name: Disable fast startup
System Performance.Description: Disables hybrid shutdown for more reliable power cycles.
System Performance.Warning: CAUTION: Disabling fast startup may affect dual-boot configurations and some hardware wake features. Can improve compatibility with Linux dual-boot setups.
